#summary Simple DIY'able Development Board for the LPC313x ARM9 Microcontroller

This board has been prototyped but is not very useful.

The relevant [http://www.lis.inpg.fr/realise_au_lis/kicad/ KiCAD] design files can be found through [http://code.google.com/p/micropendous/source/checkout SVN] in the `/Abandoned_Designs/LPC313x-DIY/` directory.

A PCB of this design can be purchased at cost through [http://batchpcb.com/index.php/Products/44279 BatchPCB].
